title: Seated Knee Extensions
description: Place a rolled up towel underneath your grounded knee Your hands should then be placed palm down, supporting a slight back lean, on the ground behind you When ready, lift the heel of your grounded food off the ground, ever so slightly, creating a further knee extension You should feel a minor flex in your working quadricep muscle Gently lower your heel back to the ground and repeat for the specified amount of reps or time
